item.title: Creating Windows bootable USB on Linux
item.description: This is more for self documentation than anything else. Had positive results using WoeUSB (https://github.com/woeusb/WoeUSB) 1 fdisk -l Then 1 sudo ./woeusb-5.2.4.bash --device $ISO_FILENAME $DEVICE Eg. 1 sudo ./woeusb-5.2.4.bash --device Win10_21H2_English_x64.iso /dev/sdd
